text: Juan Carlos Sánchez (born March 1, 1985) is a Bolivian football defender currently under contract with Universitario de Sucre in the Liga de Futbol Profesional Boliviano. ==External links== * Profile at ceroacero * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cochabamba Category:Association football defenders Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Club Aurora players Category:The Strongest players Category:Club Blooming players Category:Club Real Potosí players Category:Universitario de Sucre footballers
title: Juan Carlos Sánchez Ampuero
